Name: Relentless
Description: Gain {{ level * 5 }} maximum health. Master this ability to unlock the Brute archetype.

Name: Trickster
Description: Become {{ level * 5 }}% harder to detect when performing stealthy activities. Master this ability to unlock the Scoundrel archetype.

Name: Discipline
Description: Gain devotion {{ level * 5 }}% faster. Master this ability to unlock the Ascetic archetype.

Name: Traveler
Description: Reveal {{ level * 10 }}% more of the map when exploring new places. Master this ability to unlock the Survivalist archetype.

Name: Arcanum
Description: Gain {{ level * 3 }} maximum sanctity. Master this ability to unlock the Philosopher archetype.

Name: Poet
Description: Gain fame {{ level * 5 }}% faster. Master this ability to unlock the Opportunist archetype.

Name: Backstab
Description: You are {{ level * 15 }}% more likely to attack first in combat.

Name: MartialArts
Description: You deal {{ level * 5 }}% more damage in combat.

Name: Apprentice
Description: You are capable of learning level {{ level }} spells.

Name: Bash
Description: You deal {{ level * 10 }}% more damage with blunt weapons.

Name: Student
Description: You are capable of learning level {{ level }} spells.

Name: Vigilance
Description: You are {{ level * 10 }}% less likely to be ambushed.

Name: Strider
Description: Traveling on the map requires {{ level * 10 }}% less endurance.

Name: Skinner
Description: You have a {{ level * 5 }}% chance of obtaining a usable fur after kiling a beast.

Name: Charmer
Description: You are {{ level * 5 }}% more likely to succeed when choosing charm dialogues.

Name: Haggler
Description: Prices at shops are {{ level * 3}}% cheaper.
